events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I would like to initiate a refund because it does not fit as expected and I am not satisfied with the product.
The case was reviewed and categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting to return the product for money back.
A customer service representative has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer regarding their recent jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to initiate a refund for your jacket. I am here to help you with that process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or any tags removed? This will help us proceed with the refund.
Thank you for your prompt response. My order number is 874392, and I have not worn the jacket or removed any tags. It is still in its original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We can offer you a full refund once the jacket is received back at our warehouse. I will email you the return shipping label today.
I appreciate your assistance and the quick turnaround with the return label. I will send the jacket back as soon as I receive the label.
We have received the returned jacket in good condition and processed a full refund to your original payment method. You should see the amount credited shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
Since the refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
